name: Space Shooter (Hyprodermic)
description:
This is a game I made following a tutorial. I am learning to code Games with Unity. I wanted to upload this game (for free of course) so that people could try it out and maybe give me some ideas of what I could improve or add to the game. And while trying to do that I will learn more and more about the subject.

(If you are interested in the tutorial, it is on Udemy -> Udemy

So if you have anything to say, feedback or ideas, please tell me!

Thank you!
